column1: I really find it difficult to believe this movie is rated highly by people. It's hands down the worst movie I've seen in my life

This movie is perfect in all its categories: credits, sound track, production, casting, writing, photography, editing, acting, and direction. I was amazed with the freedom of the use of the camera. This movie will change the way movies are made. Slow-mo, stills, black and white, and color were all used to brilliant effect.

The editing is a mess, and the transitions of the plot or characters are rather strange. There is no narrative focus and the storytelling is unbalanced. I cannot really understand why such a bad movie received an overwhelming approval from the critics.
This movie really touched my heart, it really is the best movie of the year and everyone should see this masterpiece.
I really find it difficult to believe this movie is rated highly by people. It's hands down the worst movie I've seen in my life

This movie really touched my heart, it really is the best movie of the year and everyone should see this masterpiece.
Poised to be an instant classic, almost everything about this film is phenomenal - the acting, the cinematography, the discography, etc.

The editing is a mess, and the transitions of the plot or characters are rather strange. There is no narrative focus and the storytelling is unbalanced. I cannot really understand why such a bad movie received an overwhelming approval from the critics.
I personally found this movie to be boring. Definitely one of the most boring movies I've ever seen.

It was well acted, directed, and the music was good. But the story is yawn. Not trying to rip anybody but I checked my watch a dozen times during this movie.

This movie is just plain bad. There must be some big payola going round this awards season. Badly written, average acting at best, all the characters are unrelatable and inlikeable. 2 hours of my life wasted.
I love this movie. This film is a milestone in cinematography. Great Immersive camera-work. This film is an experience and i has already seen it 4 times and I only see more quality of the film.
